channel.title: CVE Feed for ShapedPlugin -- Widget Post Slider
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ShapedPlugin -- Widget Post Slider

item.title: CVE-2024-32801|2024-08-02T02:20:35.588Z -- shapedplugin -- widget%20post%20slider
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ShapedPlugin Widget Post Slider allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Widget Post Slider: from n/a through 1.3.5.
